Sabatoth discovered that by using the D-2 portals to access parallel Earth, through which people could merge consciousness with their anti-particle double and transmute their DNA, that passage into the Halls of Amenti could be made without the use of the Staff or Blue Flame. Neither man realized they were sending people into fragmentation and both believed they were assisting their own people who were being unfairly denied by the other side. The Elohim again intervened to stop these activities. The personal mor- phogenetic fields of individuals involved with ascension after the Halls of Amenti were closed were removed from the Sphere of Amenti morphoge- netic field and placed within the Third Eye of Horus portal passage in the 93
